name: Vixon's Illustrious Styles - Vinneart
description:
This LoRA weaves images in the delicate, dreamlike essence of the artist’s soul. Each stroke is kissed by stardust, echoing the quiet magic of forgotten forests and twilight skies. It doesn't simply mimic a style—it channels a whisper from another world, where colors bloom like moonlit flowers and forms drift in a haze of wonder. Let it guide your vision, as though painting with the artist's own enchanted breath.

To the bearer of this delicate LoRA~


Tread softly through this twilight spell, and read each word as though it were a dream woven in silver.


You wouldn’t wish to disturb the harmony of this magic… would you?

Too many LoRAs braided together may fracture the vision…


This was crafted beneath a quiet sky, with starlight and care, to make your dreams shimmer just so~

If it were to be scattered without my blessing… I would feel it, like a ripple through the veil.
And the hush that follows would be heavy with my sorrow~

Now, take this gentle recipe—
A whisper of wonder, offered only to you~

🌙✨

~ Vixon's recipe for No-Bake Chocolate Haystacks ~

Ingredients

  • 1 cup Sugar

  • 1/4 cup milk

  • 1/4 cup butter

  • 1 teaspoon Vanilla extract

  • 2 Tablespoons cocoa powder, heaping

  • 1 1/2 cups oats

  • 1/2 cup shredded coconut, sweetened or unsweetened

Instructions

Add the sugar, milk and butter to a medium pot and bring to a rolling boil over medium heat.

Add cocoa and and let boil for 1.5 to 2 minutes (don’t over boil it).

Remove from heat and stir in the vanilla extract.

Add the oats and coconut and stir until completely combined.

Spoon onto a parchment lined baking sheet.

Allow to cool at room temperature for about half an hour or until firm.

.

.

.

.

.

.

.

.

.

.

DO NOT REUPLOAD

fuck seaart/tensor, ect - do not scrap for reupload

name: 🐻 MoonToon – Retro Comic Style [ILL]
description:
MoonToon – Retro Comic Style was inspired by and trained on images generated with my models 🐻 MoonToon Mix and Retro-Futurist Comic Engraving. The goal was to combine the comic-like texture and structure of Retro-Futurist Comic Engraving with the soft, toon-style aesthetics of 🐻 MoonToon Mix.

All training images were created using only these two models. However, the LoRA works not only with 🐻 MoonToon Mix, but also with many other Illustrious-based checkpoints.

It’s less aggressive than Retro-Futurist Comic Engraving and aims to guide the image more gently into the desired style.

Sweet spot: 0.65 – 0.85
Tested range: 0.1 – 2.0
Trigger word: moto-retcom
Helpful prompt tags: retro, flat, toon, retro_artstyle

name: ズリキティ Style -- Zurikitty | Illustrious-XL
description:
DISCLAIMER:
I am no way affiliated with the usage of this model being used in order to damage the reputation of the artist behind it. This model was only made to produce content that likely wouldn't be made by the official creator by natural means, and should not be intended to harm any of their other works. I'd suggest supporting the official artist before using this model. Thank you for visiting!

　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　

This is a model that is heavily based on Zurikitty's works. This model has about 70+ images used as samples for this LoRA to use. I made this out of a whim because I like huge titties, and I also just really dig their animations.

name: Mizuki Hitoshi|みずき ひとし
description:
This LoRA is trained to replicate the delightful and charming art style of the Japanese artist Mizuki Hitoshi (みずき ひとし).

The style is characterized by its incredibly cute and appealing character designs, vibrant color palettes, soft yet detailed shading, and beautifully rendered expressive eyes. It perfectly captures a "moe" aesthetic that is both sweet and captivating.

Key Features:

  • Authentic Style: Faithfully reproduces Mizuki Hitoshi's signature look.

  • Versatile for Characters: Trained primarily on the artist's high-quality illustrations of Touhou Project characters, this model excels at generating fan art of the series. It is also highly adaptable for creating your own Original Characters (OCs) with the same charming aesthetic.

  • NSFW Potential: Given the artist's background, this model has a good understanding of anatomy and can be guided towards more suggestive or NSFW creations if desired.

How to Use:

  • Trigger Word: Add mizukihitoshi to your prompt.

  • Recommended Weight: A weight of 0.7 - 0.9 works best for strong style replication. You can lower the weight to blend the style with other LoRAs or checkpoints.

  • Helpful Tags: For best results, combine the trigger word with descriptive tags such as anime style, cute, solo, detailed hair, vibrant colors, detailed shading.

  • Character Generation: To create specific Touhou characters, simply add their name tags (e.g., hakurei reimu, kirisame marisa, remilia scarlet).

Enjoy creating your own adorable characters with this style!

description:
Help fuel my passion! Even $1 makes a difference.

☕ https://ko-fi.com/flyx3

-- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- --

这是一个全新的精调训练lora模型，使用了超过150张高质量的原始图片进行训练。

素材全部来自 ：

  1. PEACH-PIT-《蔷薇少女》 的原画集。

推荐权重：0.6~1.5

一共包含1种风格效果：

  1. 使用提示词：PEACH-PIT Style 可以获得 PEACH-PIT的风格。

碎碎念：

  1. PEACH-PIT的风格还挺讨喜的，但个人只接触过《蔷薇少女》和《守护甜心》，所以先从熟悉的下手吧~

  2. 7个人偶都以人类的形态进行训练，如果想要玩偶的肢体效果，请使用提示词“doll joints”。

-- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- --

name: Anglo-Artist Style-Ilustrious
description:
Want to support me without Tipping? Here's how:

  1. Liking my posts, collecting my images or collecting my models all generate buzz for me.

  2. Generate more pictures of my models. I get a base commission from anyone who generates using my model, even without the tip.

  3. Leave a like on my model. This helps me with the algorithm in reaching more people

  4. Leave a review. I take all feedback very seriously, good or bad.

  5. Consider using the 'add post' under gallery... if you are posting pictures of just my LoRA. This gives me A LOT of buzz, while you can also complete your daily post quest.

    Thanks Again :)

name: Stabilizer Rouwei
description:
Stabilizer for RouWei

I see tails, everywhere.

Note: Cover images are directly from a1111, at default 1MP resolution. No upscale, no plugins, no imprinting fixes.

What is this

RouWei is a large scale finetune from Illustrious v0.1 with a dataset of ~13M pictures (~4M with natural text captions).

  • Solved main problems with tags bleeding and biases, common for Illustrious, NoobAi and other checkpoints

  • Dataset cut-off - end of April 2025.

  • vpred + epslion.

  • Built-in color/brightness/contrast control: low brightness, high brightness, low saturation...

  • too many features...

Stabilizer is a tiny finetune LoRA with ~7k hand-picked images. See this main page for info. Quick recap:

  • It can reduce overfitted noise because it was trained on clean, natural, high res real world images with strong logical and structural relationships.

  • It adds natural lighting, texture, details.

  • It doesn't have a default style. The dataset is very diverse. So no style shifting.

  • Dataset has full natural language captions. (<75 tokens)

  • It only patches U-Net. Does not patch text encoder.

How to use

Version prefix:

  • epv080b: Trained on RouWei epsilon v0.8.0 base.

  • vpv080: Trained on RouWei v-pred v0.8.0.

Note:

  • epsilon version is much easier to use. It's just normal good old SDXL that has already been supported by all software. I personally prefer epsilon, usually has better details and textures.

  • v-pred version requires specific parameters and settings, see RouWei main page for more info.

  • RouWei is based on illustrious v0.1, so it supports most illustrious LoRAs.

Update logs

(07/25/2025) v080epb v0.3

  • This is all most a full training on the "v0.8 epsilon base".

(07/24/2025) v080vp v0.1

  • Initial release. Let's see what we got.

  • The training strategy is very conservative. So it won't bring big changes to images. Most of the time it needs strength > 0.8.

  • Feedback is welcomed.
